llm_text:
Why:
The alert is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1), which strongly increased the model score (SHAP +2.8732). Large value signals — amount_received (13055.8, SHAP +1.21042) and amount_paid (13055.8, SHAP +0.641277) — further raised the score. Timing also contributed: dayofweek (6, SHAP +0.505227) increased the score. Receiving_currency_euro (value=1, SHAP −0.445818) partially reduced the alert magnitude.

Conclusion:
Based solely on the listed drivers, the transaction was flagged because it is an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) for a relatively large, equal paid/received amount (amount_received and amount_paid = 13055.8) occurring on dayofweek=6; receipt in euros (receiving_currency_euro=1) modestly mitigates the signal. If investigated further, prioritize ACH-specific context and corroborating party/bank details.
